backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, documents, and user profile types with storage maps and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor data structures into the new ones with added fields like discipline and additionalInformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for recent enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog component built with alert-dialog primitives.
Dropdown component that loads all equipment and allows selecting one by equipment number.
Reusable form field wrapper handling labels, errors, help text, and child inputs.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with header, footer, and a content container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for CRUD operations on equipment, spare parts, and related backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Provides predefined cataloguing templates and a helper to retrieve template fields by name.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Utilities for converting between bigint timestamps and formatted date strings.
frontend/src/lib/disciplines.ts: Maps engineering discipline enums to labels and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into readable messages and detects authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Exports tabular data to CSV or PDF using manual PDF construction.
frontend/src/lib/files.ts: Converts browser files to ExternalBlob objects and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic validation helpers for required fields, numbers, and email formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: Implements cataloguing record creation, editing, and deletion with templateâ€‘based attribute handling.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Handles uploading, viewing, editing metadata, and deleting documents linked to equipment.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Displays equipment list and supports editing and deleting equipment records.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Provides a form for creating new equipment records with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Manages creation, viewing, editing, and deletion of maintenance records for equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Renders reports for equipment, spare parts, and maintenance with CSV/PDF export functions and data fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: Manages spare parts creation, editing, deletion, search, and file attachments with dialogs and equipment lookup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending requests related to adding additionalInformation and discipline fields across the app.
